## Links to Application

We provide a direct link to a specific page on our <a target="blank" href="https://montilab.bu.edu/Xposome-API/">Xposome interface</a>. This feature allows users to connect information from their web application to our website.

There are two types of queries that users can request from our web page through a web browser:
<ul>
  <li>Query the Information Page (e.g. home page, about page, contact page, and sign-in page) </li>
  <li>Query the Project Page (e.g. a list of project portals or chemical screenings that are available in our GeneHive database)</li>
</ul>

Hera are four URL tags that can be used to search our web page:

<table class="tag-table">
  <tr>
    <td><strong>Tag</strong></td>
    <td><strong>Description</strong></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>?page</td>
    <td>a url tag that searches for a specific page on the Xposome interface (e.g. an Information Page or a Project Page)</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&tab</td>
    <td>an additional tag that navigates to a specific tab on the project page</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&chemical_id</td>
    <td>an additional tag that navigates to a specific chemical id/CAS id/chemical name on the project page</a></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&stat</td>
    <td>an additional tag that navigates to a statistical tab on the project page</a></td>
  </tr>
</table>

<br>

### Link to Project Page

<p><strong>URL: </strong><a target="blank" href="https://montilab.bu.edu/Xposome/?page=ADIPO&tab=chemical_explorer&chemical_id=2-ethylhexanol&stat=gene_expression">https://montilab.bu.edu/Xposome/?page=ADIPO&tab=chemical_explorer&chemical_id=2-ethylhexanol&stat=gene_expression</a></p>

<br>

<table class="link-table">
  <tr>
    <td><strong>Parameter</strong></td>
    <td><strong>Value</strong></td>
    <td><strong>Description</strong></td>
    <td><strong>Data Type</strong></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>page</td>
    <td>name of a particular project in the GeneHive database (see <a href="#api-calls">API Explorer</a> on how to retrieve a list of project names)<br>
    </td>
    <td>a project page on the Xposome application</td>
    <td>string</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>tab</td>
    <td><em>
      - about (default) <br> 
      - annotation <br> 
      - chemical_explorer <br> 
      - marker_explorer <br> 
      - heatmap_explorer <br> 
      - k2_taxanomer_results <br> 
      - compare_multiple
      </em>
    </td>
    <td>a tab panel of a particular project. Currently, there are seven tab-panels defined for a given project.</td>
    <td>string</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>chemical_id</td>
    <td>see <a href="#api-calls">API Explorer</a> on how to retrieve a list of chemical ids/CAS ids/chemical names of a particular project</td>

    <td>string</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>stat</td>
    <td><em>
      - gene_expression (default) <br> 
      - gene_set_enrichment <br> 
      - connectivity

    <td>string</td>
  </tr>
</table>
